name: Johnny Morris CarbonLite Technique Casting Rod
description: Stepping up in competition? We have your rod! The Bass Pro Shops® Johnny Morris® CarbonLite™ Technique Casting Rod is built with Carbon Coil Technology™, an advanced construction process that creates a double-helix configuration of materials for structural reinforcement. Made with RT4 Graphite, developed for the avid tournament angler, these rod blanks are lightweight and extremely sensitive, so anglers can use them with confidence—especially with a win on the line. And now, every CarbonLite Technique rod is designed with a technique-specific action to fit any bassin' approach, from Froggin' to Deep Crankin' techniques and more. Adding durable Fuji FaZlite guides continues the emphasis on weight reduction; premium Winn® grips deliver the ultimate in comfort, reducing hand stress to help maintain your casting stroke as the day wears on. Our Skeletonized Air reel seat enhances sensitivity by maximizing blank exposure. All covered by our Extraordinary 10 Year Warranty.

name: Crappie Maxx Camo Fishing Line
description: Crappie Maxx® Camo Fishing Line is camouflaged to be undetectable in any color water, yet its fluorescent stripe can be seen easily above water. It's soft and supple, with low memory for easy casting, high-abrasion resistance, and excellent knot strength. 1/4 lb. spool.

name: XPS Swim Jig
description: You'll consistently hook into the baitfish bite when you fish our Bass Pro Shops® XPS® Swim Jig. Quality construction features realistic skirt colors to mimic bass' favorite forage. Medium wire Mustad UltraPoint hook. The flat head on the XPS swim jig makes it easy to skip under docks and low-hanging trees.

name: Power Plus Graphite Telescopic Spinning Rod
description: Our advanced construction process combines graphite with fiberglass for a rod blank with superior flexibility and strength. The Bass Pro Shops® Power Plus™ Graphite Telescopic Spinning Rod is sensitive enough to detect light nibbles; accurate enough for long casts with full control. Lightweight design for easy all-day use. Ideal for light angling, especially for crappie and panfish, but ready to go toe-to-toe with those big bass and walleye, too! We've probably priced them too low--because these rods not only look great, they fish better than many rods costing twice as much. The best feature of this spinning rod is that it telescopes down to under 2' for easy transport. Equipped with comfy EVA foam grips and smooth aluminum oxide guides.

name: Swerve Glide Brushtail Swimbait
description: Give big bass what they crave most with our XPS® Swerve Glide Brushtail Swimbait. The attention-grabbing size and brushtail offers a wicked imitation of favorite forage. The wide side-to-side action draws in predators from long range and like a feisty fleeing baitfish, this swimbait swerves 180° to initiate instinctual strikes. Fish them using a slow, steady retrieve or speed things up with a fast chop without the bait rolling over. Bass Pro Shops XPS Swerve Glide Brushtail Swimbait fills livewells at shallow depths or worked in deep water, slow sinking at 1' per 2 seconds. Each swimbait comes rigged with sticky sharp treble hooks featuring a black nickel finish to resist corrosion.

name: Magna SuperLock Hooks
description: Magna SuperLock Hooks are made from the finest quality 3X-strong high carbon steel, with chemically sharpened needle points for easy penetration. The Magna SuperLock Hooks feature a special bend which works to hold a variety of soft plastic baits in place, wider gap for solid hook sets and sharp needle points which stay sharp cast after cast.

name: Prodigy Walleye Bottom Bouncer Casting Rod
description: Prodigy® Walleye Bottom Bouncer Casting Rod is custom-crafted for this popular walleye fishing technique. This walleye rod is made with a lightweight, durable RT4 blank that is sensitive enough to feel the lightest bite from cautious walleyes. Guides feature frosted-gunsmoke stainless steel frames and zirconium ceramic inserts to keep your line running smooth. Minimalist reel seat allows you direct contact to the rod blank. Lightweight EVA split grips with X-Wrap enhance comfort and performance under any conditions.

name: Strike King KVD Hard Knock Squarebill Crankbait
description: It may not actually thump that lethargic bass on the head, but the Strike King® KVD Hard Knock Squarebill Crankbait will definitely get his attention. Like the VanDam original, it'll bounce and deflect off cover, constantly wandering with an erratic searching action while still running true; that's enough to spur most bass into action. But this Hard Knock version replaces the standard BB rattles with a single large knocker ball, and the deep, reverberating thud it emits is unlike that of any other bait. It speaks to bass on a primal level, and they respond – simple as that. Also great when long, accurate, water-covering casts are needed.

name: Hi-Vis Camo Fishing Line
description: Add super stealth to your approach! Crappie Maxx® Hi-Vis Camo Fishing Line utilizes repeating 2.5' sections of Hiv-Vis Orange, Hi-Vis Yellow, and clear mono to break up the visibility of the line underwater, while making it highly visible above water. For best results, tie onto your lure with the clear section. It's soft and supple, with low memory for easy casting, yet is highly abrasion-resistant with excellent knot strength.

name: Daiwa BG/Offshore Angler Gold Cup Inshore Spinning Combo
description: Move up in performance, without moving up in price. The Daiwa® BG/Offshore Angler™ Gold Cup Inshore Spinning Combo is ideal for targeting everything from redfish, snook, and gator trout to stripers, blues, and calico bass.The popular Daiwa BG Spinning Reel is leaner and meaner than ever, with its industrial-grade Hardbodyz body and side cover that delivers maximum strength without the extra weight. The uniquely-shaped Air Rotor cuts out another 15% of excess weight, distributing the load evenly for superior strength and balance. Oversized Digigear™ machine-cut gears; braid-ready Dynamic Cut aluminum ABS spool; quality 7-bearing (6+1) system; waterproof Carbon ATD drag system; machined aluminum screw-in handle for maximum leverage.Our Offshore Angler Gold Cup Inshore Spinning Rod is built on our weight-reducing, sensitivity-enhancing RT2 Graphite blank for sound, reliable performance. Sea Guide aluminum oxide guides with stainless steel frames; cushioned reel seat; full cork grips provide a comfortable hold in any weather.

name: Rapala Rippin' Rap Rattling Lipless Crankbait
description: The sleek body shape and bold color selection make this hot sinking Rapala® Rippin' Rap® Rattling Lipless Crankbait perfect for covering water fast with a rip 'n' dip action or just burning it straight in with a high-speed reel. Either way, bass come completely unhinged when this hard-vibrating rattler comes near! Long-casting, textured scale body, with extra-loud BBs inside for long-distance sound transmission. Equipped with super-sharp black nickel VMC® hooks.

name: Hybrid Swimbait Jighead
description: Hybrid Swimbait Jighead features a wide gap with a hybrid bend, maximizing sets and improving strength (1x) for fighting heavier fish. Constructed of high-carbon steel, the hybrid hook features a forged shank. The jig boasts a wide diameter spring to securely lock soft plastic baits in place, while a 60° jig eye and 3D holographic eyes offer additional attraction.

name: Tournament Series Squirmin' Worm 4''
description: Tournament Series® Squirmin' Worm® has the distinctive Squirmin' tail which has proven to be a deadly enticer on big bass. Plus, Squirmin' Worms are infused with salt and 8up™ scent to keep that lunker holding the bite longer.

name: Shimano Sahara FJ Pro Qualifier Spinning Combo
description: Smooth dependability, great price! The Shimano® Sahara® FJ Pro Qualifier® Spinning Combo pairs two of the top names in fishing, giving you the ideal setup when you're ready to step up your game. The Shimano Sahara FJ Spinning Reel is known for its durability and performance. Lightweight and balanced, this reel is ideal for anglers at all levels, as it incorporates many of Shimano's signature technologies. These include the popular X-Ship pinion gear support system that ensures effortless handle rotation, even under load; efficient G-Free Body design with SilentDrive and the Propulsion Line Management System; a solid 5-bearing (4+1) system with instant anti-reverse; and premium Hagane™ cold-forged gears for superior cranking power and smooth winding. Screw-in handle. Our tournament-ready Bass Pro Shops Pro Qualifier Spinning Rod is built on our advanced RT3 graphite blank with exclusive Powerwall construction. This rod is wonderfully light, strong, and sensitive! Features: Fuji guides with aluminum oxide inserts; 2-piece minimalist reel seat; split grip handle design; lightweight EVA grips with X-wrap for maximum comfort in all conditions.

name: Excel Monofilament Line
description: Excel® Monofilament Line is manufactured under strict quality control standards. These standards provide you with a monofilament fishing line that has superior resistance to abrasion. Excel is soft, smooth, and limp, allowing for long casts, plus the limited stretch and high-impact shock strength mean there's no surprise when you set the hook.

name: Worm Hook and Sinker Kit
description: If you love it when a bass hammers your worm, start rigging your worms with the Bass Pro Shops® Worm Hook and Sinker Kit for even more angling success. This kit includes 3 sizes of worm hooks (you get twelve 2/0, ten 3/0, and ten 4/0), 3 sizes of lead worm weights (you get ten of each size: 1/8 oz., 3/16 oz. and ¼ oz.), 2 Double Down Hook Keepers, and a fishing utility box (4.75'L x 3'W x 1.18'H) to keep it all organized. These Bass Pro Shops EWG worm hooks are 1X strong with a black nickel finish. The hook keeper secures your worm and keeps it in proper position.

name: Trout Bait Assortment
description: Maximize your trout catch with the Berkley PowerBait® Trout Bait Assortment. This handy collection of the 4 best-selling Trout Bait colors allows you to give the trout exactly what they want, every time you hit the water. This is the same moldable, easy-to-use, biodegradable trout bait used by anglers across the country; its original floating formula enhances dispersion of scent and flavor to bring in distant trout. 92% biodegradable, 8% non-degradable microscopic spheres, formed from natural silica. Assortment includes full-size 1.8-oz. jars: one each Chartreuse, Fluorescent Orange, Rainbow, and Yellow. 4-Pack.

name: Super Vis Fishing Line
description: Super Vis Fishing Line is great for dawn, dusk, or night fishing. Bright yellow-green color literally glows in low light conditions so you can see even the lightest twitch. 1/4 lb. spool.

name: SS Braid Fishing Line
description: S Braid Fishing Line is our most advanced braided fishing line to date. XPS SS Braid is precision crafted from 8 woven fibers, resulting in unparalleled strength and a consistent roundness that makes casting smoother than ever. It has virtually no stretch, so you'll feel every touch. Plus, the extra-small diameter helps with finesse presentations; enhanced color protection helps prevent premature washout.

name: Rage Tail Craw Soft Bait
description: If the waters you're fishing call for craws, toss in the Strike King® Rage Tail® Craw and watch the water boil in a violent frenzy! Exclusive design features 2 realistic pincers and a long, slender body engineered to create lots of turbulence. For best results, fish Texas-rigged, Carolina-rigged, or as a jig trailer.
